name: A Pigment Formed in a Realm Outside
name_original: A Pigment Formed in a Realm Outside
description:
A Pigment Formed in a Realm Outside is a top down shooter. You have an arsenal of six color types and have to choose the most effective color for every enemy each. Drain shields with the black color and deal   triple damage  with the complementary color.

Bullets aren't doing any damage right now soooo.. ya can't really play it... sorry
